[++QR Scan Simulation Codes++]

[Simulate Gohanks event QR]
D3000000 3075669C
A0000000 FFFB0004
DB000000 00000000
D4000000 00000004
D8000000 00000000
DC000000 FFFFFFFF
D2000000 00000000
{Activates the Gohanks event in Baba's Pallace}

[Simulate character QRs]
D3000000 30764AD0
DC000000 00003FC0
9000000C FF000002
00000000 00036DEE

2000000C 0000000B

2000002C 0000000B
D0000000 00000000
D2000000 00000000
{Adds Tanks, Great Satanman, and Gorus at level 30 with their default moves. Requires save and reload to update level/moves}
